name: FetchAllScorecardOutcomes
description:
Retrieve all rule outcomes from scorecards.

Use this tool to fetch all outcomes from scorecards in Datadog. It's useful for obtaining detailed results of applied rules.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results per page, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: page_offset
parameters.description: Specific offset to use as the beginning of the returned page, represented as an integer.

value_schema.description: Specific offset to use as the beginning of the returned page.

parameters.name: include_rule_details
parameters.description: Specify if related rule details should be included in the response.

value_schema.description: Include related rule details in the response.

parameters.name: specified_outcome_values
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of specific outcome attributes to return. Limits the response to these attributes.

value_schema.description: Return only specified values in the outcome attributes.

parameters.name: rule_fields_to_return
parameters.description: Specify which fields to return in the included rule details.

value_schema.description: Return only specified values in the included rule details.

parameters.name: filter_outcomes_by_service_name
parameters.description: Filter outcomes based on a specific service name. Provide the service name as a string.

value_schema.description: Filter the outcomes on a specific service name.

parameters.name: outcome_state_filter
parameters.description: Filter the scorecard outcomes by a specific state. Accepts a state value as a string.

value_schema.description: Filter the outcomes by a specific state.

parameters.name: filter_by_rule_id
parameters.description: Filter outcomes based on specific rule ID.

value_schema.description: Filter outcomes based on rule ID.

parameters.name: filter_by_rule_name
parameters.description: Filter outcomes based on a specific rule name.

value_schema.description: Filter outcomes based on rule name.

parameters.name: filter_rule_enabled
parameters.description: Filter outcomes based on whether a rule is enabled (true) or disabled (false).

value_schema.description: Filter outcomes on whether a rule is enabled/disabled.
